title.rendered: 2023 College Football Championship Travel Package Rates

content.rendered:
2023 College Football Championship Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a travel package including luxury accommodations for three nights, upper level tickets to the 2023 College Football Championship, and more. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and anything else that will make your experience absolutely perfect.
HotelRates From
Hilton Checkers Los Angeles$4,225
Conrad Los Angeles$4,695
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until three months prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
